name: Polaris Components
description:
This UI Kit provides you with all the components within the Polaris design system. Component variants give you the same flexibility and component configurations that are found in Polaris React.


Full documentation: polaris.shopify.com

Github repo: github.com/shopify/polaris


What's new:

  • Refactored all components so styles match Polaris React repo
  • Auto layout has been added to all components and any old bugs have been fixed
  • Missing components and component variants have been added so the component set is now complete and matches Polaris React
  • Variant names now better match the corresponding prop names on the React component
  • Added detailed release notes to file so it is easy to track changes over time
